name: CLARITY_PROMPT
description: This table contains basic information about each Prompt record from the Protocol Prompts (LPQ) master file.

columns.name: PROMPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the prompt record.

columns.name: PROMPT_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the prompt record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_TITLE
columns.description: This column stores the title displayed for a prompt in the Nurse Triage Protocol.
